title: FS/FT: T206 Lot of 6 ALL SOLD THANK YOU
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T206 Lot of 6 ALL SOLD THANK YOU
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a nice sized t206 lot consisting of some great cards.  

Lot includes: 
[STRIKE]Kleinow Boston (Raw probably will grade a 1.5-2) - $75[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Grimshaw (some creasing with some writing) (Poor) - $12 [/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Freeman (nice eye appeal, badly damaged corner) (Poor) - 12[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Stahl (Glove doesn't show) (Fair condition, nice card) - $14[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Spencer (Has some front and back paperloss) (Poor) - $12[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Covaleski - $13[/STRIKE]
Pictures: 

I think it is fair to offer this lot for $40 $40/4 = $10 per common! 

I am very much open to offers/trades. Please PM, I am willing to work with buyers. 


Please allow $2 for shipping/handling

Please let me know if you need insurance on the cards too. 

Best Regards.
Bump $120! I need to sell these cards or i'm going to the show without money!
Individual pricing now available. Really need to sell.
Thanks to all my buyers! All cards have been sold.
